name: Bleeding Kansas
description:
Bleeding Kansas

This game is about the events in Kansas from 1854 to 1859 when abolitionists from the North of the United States relocated to Kansas to make sure slavery doesn’t spread to the new state. Become a Liberator of Kansas and take up your arms for the heroic fight for the emancipation of all the suppressed people in the 19th century United States.

Do you have what it takes to be a man of action? Pick up your Sharpe’s rifle and become a Liberator of Kansas.

Features
  • Realistic looking weapons
  • In-game storytelling
  • Historic battlegrounds
